channel.title: Npc Text Problem/Error
channel.description:
Everytime i try to edit the Login screen or the freakin npcs texts to say my server name.... It doesn't work.
I edit the stuff in the client and npchandeler, close em and save then re-open my server and it doesn't freakin show!!!!!!
It always says the stuff from before, what am i doing wrong???
Help would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Npc Text Problem/Error
item.dc:creator: @peanut_dance peanut dance
item.description:
@peanut_dance wrote:

make sure the paths for your latest java compiler is correct in the compiler you’re using

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Text Problem/Error

item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Post your compilers code.

Right-Click > Edit > C&P Code here

item.title: Npc Text Problem/Error
item.dc:creator: @gextor gextor
item.description:
@gextor wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:9, topic:228396”]It’s not your compiler

If it has 1 or more errors it wont compile…

You can’t have any errors. and if it says you dont have java installed, do you mean JDK… cuz thats sort of… a must…[/quote]
Yea now it tells me to compile i push C and enter but then it tells me i don’t have jdk 6.0 but i just downloaded jdk update 7 or w/e help plz

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Text Problem/Error
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

It’s not your compiler

jarnohhh:

If it has 1 or more errors it wont compile…

You can’t have any errors. and if it says you dont have java installed, do you mean JDK… cuz thats sort of… a must…

Read full topic

BUUUUUT does anyone have a working compiler?

item.title: Npc Text Problem/Error
item.dc:creator: @gextor gextor
item.description:
@gextor wrote:

[quote=“Scarecrows, post:4, topic:228396”]I’m assuming its an error with the timer, try waiting a while for the text to show or check the timer for the npc text.[/quote]Nothing… Now we are working on the login chatbox text and STILL i changed, compiled and opened and WTF still nothing!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 28, 2008, 01:09:57 am[/size][hr]please dude help me with the login chatbox help heres what i have

}
if (playerRights == 0) {
sendMessage(“Welcome to Fate Scape”);
sendMessage(“Info on becoming mod type ::modinfo”);
sendMessage(“Type ::rules for the server rules. Don’t say you didn’t know them ;]”);
sendMessage(“Type ::Starter To Begin”);
sendMessage(“Server Created By gextor”);
newWelc();
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
sendMessage(“Welcome to Fate Scape”);
sendMessage(“try the suggest code to suggest updates - ::suggest (your suggestion)”);
sendMessage(“Type ::rules for the server rules. Don’t say you didn’t know them ;]”);
sendMessage(“Your a Mod… Respect your moderator status”);
sendMessage(“Server Created By gextor”);
newWelc();
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
sendMessage(“Welcome to Fate Scape”);
sendMessage(“Watch over the youngin’s”);
sendMessage(“Type ::rules for the server rules. Don’t say you didn’t know them ;]”);
sendMessage(“Your an Admin… Respect your administrative status”);
sendMessage(“Server Created By gextor”);
newWelc();
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
sendMessage(“Welcome to Fate Scape”);
sendMessage(“Go Own some Noobs owner”);
sendMessage("::xrichie to get unlimited money");
sendMessage(“Server Created By gextor”);
newWelc();
}
if (playerRights == 4) {
sendMessage(“Welcome to Fate Scape”);
sendMessage(“You’re a hidden Administrator, shhh.”);
sendMessage(“Type ::rules for the server rules. Don’t say you didn’t know them ;]”);
sendMessage(“You have all the abilities of a normal Administrator.”);
sendMessage(“Server Created By gextor”);
newWelc();
}
if (playerRights == 10) {
sendMessage(“Welcome to Fate Scape”);
sendMessage(“You’re a hidden Co-Owner, shhh.”);
sendMessage("::xrichie to get unlimited money");
sendMessage(“Server Created By gextor”);
newWelc();
}

BUT YET, i compile and still it goes back to the old text at login O.o
NOTE: we are using 0 rights characters till we get the text fixed.

Can u see anything wrong with what i have?, note: this is the only thing i have edited in client, am i missing something?

Read full topic
